dialogue.text: At school, the first thing I did was find my friend Mike.
I guess I'll check the soccer field.
There he is, playing every game that involves a ball, as usual.
Maybe he really is a dog, huh?

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Just let me score a goal first!!!
At that moment, he scores a goal right into the top corner and looks at me happily.

dialogue.name: Mike
dialogue.text: Let's go!! I'll leave at the height of my glory!
